### Exercise: French House Parts Nouns and Gender

Practice the gender of French house part nouns and their articles.

#### 1. Assign the correct definite article (*le/la/l'*) to each part of the house:

___ salon (living room) 🛋️ → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le')"><span></span>

___ cuisine (kitchen) 🍳 → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la')"><span></span>

___ chambre (bedroom) 🛏️ → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la')"><span></span>

___ escalier (staircase) 🪜 → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'l\'')"><span></span>

___ salle de bains (bathroom) 🛁 → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la')"><span></span>

___ jardin (garden) 🌳 → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le')"><span></span>

___ porte (door) 🚪 → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la')"><span></span>

___ fenêtre (window) 🪟 → <input type="text" placeholder="le/la/l'" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la')"><span></span>

#### 2. Match the French term to its English equivalent:

**"le grenier"** → <input type="text" placeholder="English" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'attic')"><span></span>

**"la cave"** → <input type="text" placeholder="English" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'basement')"><span></span>

**"le couloir"** → <input type="text" placeholder="English" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'hallway')"><span></span>

**"le garage"** → <input type="text" placeholder="English" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'garage')"><span></span>

#### 3. Fill in the blanks with the correct term:

"Je vais dans ___ (the kitchen) pour cuisiner." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la cuisine')"><span></span>

"___ (The living room) est grand." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le salon')"><span></span>

"Où est ___ (the bathroom) ?" → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la salle de bains')"><span></span>

"Je monte par ___ (the staircase)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'l\'escalier')"><span></span>

"Nous ouvrons ___ (the window) pour aérer la pièce." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la fenêtre')"><span></span>

"Il y a des fleurs dans ___ (the garden)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le jardin')"><span></span>

"Ferme ___ (the door), s'il te plaît." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la porte')"><span></span>

"Ma chambre est à côté de ___ (the hallway)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le couloir')"><span></span>

"Les vélos sont dans ___ (the garage)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le garage')"><span></span>

"Il y a du vin dans ___ (the basement)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la cave')"><span></span>

"Les vieux jouets sont dans ___ (the attic)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le grenier')"><span></span>

"Je prends une douche dans ___ (the bathroom)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la salle de bains')"><span></span>

"Nous dînons dans ___ (the kitchen)." → <input type="text" placeholder="French" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'la cuisine')"><span></span>

#### 4. Correct the errors in gender/number:

"Un chambre" → <input type="text" placeholder="Correct phrase" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'une chambre')"><span></span>

"La jardin" → <input type="text" placeholder="Correct phrase" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'le jardin')"><span></span>

<script>
function checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer) {
    const span = input.nextElementSibling;
    if (input.value.trim().toLowerCase() === correctAnswer.toLowerCase()) {
        span.textContent = "✓ Correct";
        span.style.color = "green";
    } else {
        span.textContent = "";
    }
}

function showAnswers() {
    document.querySelectorAll('input[type="text"]').forEach(el => {
        const correct = el.getAttribute('oninput')?.match(/'([^']+)'/)?.[1];
        if (correct) {
            const span = el.nextElementSibling;
            span.textContent = `Réponse : ${correct}`;
            span.style.color = "blue";
        }
    });
}

function refreshPage() {
    location.reload();
}
</script>
